oai_dc:dc.dc:description: SGT Christopher Ammons posing with his M-16 rifle. The photograph is from Ammons's first tour in 1968.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Men; Soldiers; Rifles; Firearms; Helmets; Military uniforms; Military personnel
Ammons, Christopher D., 1948- ; Vietnam War, 1961-1975; United States. Army. Infantry Division, 1st; United States -- Armed Forces -- Firearms -- History -- 20th century

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The M-16 is a lightweight, air-cooled, gas-operated, magazine-fed rifle. Since the Vietnam War, the M-16 rifle family has been the primary service rifle of the U.S. armed forces.
